column2: This is an example using Accord as the company selling.

Currently there is inconsistent use of MAPs executed in sheets for POCs, and it puts larger deals at risk. Reps are low maturity when it comes to MAPs and need both process & enablement. 

With deals that take several months, have multiple stakeholders, and involve POCs, there's an opportunity to increase both conversion & deal velocity by:

- Getting reps executing 10/10 mutual plans on every deal
- Securing the outcome and timeline on bigger deals
- Upfront contracting evaluations and POCs to better qualify & convert
- Effectively guiding customers from interest to live

Additional Revenue / Mo    $100,000
Increased Productivity       25.00%
Cost / Mo                            $1,000.00
Team(s):                        East Coast ENT, West Coast MM
Winning Playbooks: Leveraging your existing materials and expert insights from our user base, we will partner closely to develop the right playbooks to run the most effective sales process.

Approved MAPs Process: Working with your sales leadership team, we will define a bulletproof process and ROE for the introduction and execution of MAPs on deals to increase conversion and deal velocity.
CRM Integration: Accord will integrate with your CRM for efficient workflow, accurate forecasting.
Rep Adoption: Accord will own the management of coaching reps on the MAP process, executing team sessions, 1:1 training, and regular office hours. 80% of eligible deals have a MAP in place.
